overview: John was the co-founder, CTO and Chief Software Architect (CSA) of Peak8 Solutions from late 2005 until 2009 where he led all product development efforts. He has over 20 years of product development and management experience, including the creation of award winning products in the service and support industry. John also served as COO and head of new products at both Distinctive Technologies and RMI.net, the latter being a publicly traded entity where he was responsible for 20 call center locations and two subsidiary software development companies. During his career, John has worked extensively with such companies as Borland, Net Objects, Symantec, Netscape and Microsoft in the development and QA testing of some of their most popular commercial products. He is the inventor of numerous technologies and has been granted two patents with five additional patents pending. Prior to entering the technology business, John served for 8 years in the US Special Forces. He holds a BA in Theology, an MS in Strategic Intelligence and an MBA in Marketing.
